sentence.Network_en: The brothers usually roll into their studio around midday.
sentence.Network_cn: 兄弟几个总是要到正午前后才姗姗来到工作室。

sentence.Network_en: Northerly winds will increase to force six by midday.
sentence.Network_cn: 到中午时分北风会加强到6级。

sentence.Network_en: At midday everyone would go down to Reg's Cafe.
sentence.Network_cn: 中午，大家都会下楼去雷吉餐馆。

entry.def: Midday is twelve o'clock in the middle of the day.

example.ex: At midday everyone would go down to Reg's Cafe...
example.tran: 中午，大家都会下楼去雷吉餐馆。
现在的时间是正午过8分钟。

entry.tran: 中午时分(指中午12点钟前后的一段时间)
entry.def: Midday is the middle part of the day, from late morning to early afternoon.

example.ex: People were beginning to tire in the midday heat.
example.tran: 在正午时分的热浪之中，人们开始感到疲倦。

auth_sentence.content: Unfortunately shortly after midday we experienced major technical issues.

auth_sentence.content: European markets also erased midday gains to turn lower.

auth_sentence.content: Thousands of anti-government protesters massed after midday Friday prayers.

mid中间+day日→一天的中间→正午

sentences.en: I awoke to bright sunlight filling my room. It was already midday.
sentences.cn: 我一醒来就看见屋里阳光灿烂, 原来已是中午了。

jushi.english: I awoke to bright sunlight filling my room, it was already midday.
jushi.chinese: 我一醒来就看见屋里阳光灿烂,原来已是中午了。

jushi.english: Don't forget that we have to see the director at midday, we must make sure that this meeting doesn't lap over.
jushi.chinese: 记住中午得去见经理,我们一定别让会开过头。

jushi.english: I assure you that I shall be here at midday tomorrow.
jushi.chinese: 我向你保证明天中午我一定到这儿。
